price: Њему се моле они који су на небесима и на Земљи; сваког трена Он се занима нечим,
arabic: يَسۡـَٔلُهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ كُلَّ يَوۡمٍ هُوَ فِي شَأۡنٖ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yasaluhu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi kulla yawmin huwa fī shanin
